templates.template:
*

Responsability:

* TODO:${user}:a Three sentences describing * the business aim of ${enclosing_type} *

* *

Events fired:

*
    *
  • {@link #MEMBER}:
    * TODO:${user}:a add fired events, tell why and when fired.
    • *
  • {@link org.olat.gui.components.XXX XXX component events}:
    * Forwards all events from the XXX component.
    • *
*

* *

Workflow:

*
    *
  • Mainflow:
    * TODO:${user}:a list most important workflow steps of ${enclosing_type}.
    * Step 2.
    • *
  • Flow B:
    * Step 1.
    * Step 2 creates {@link org.olat.gui.media.ExcelMediaResource excel media resource}.
    • *
  • Flow C:
    * Step 1.
    * Step 2.
    • *
*

* *

Multiuser events

*

fired:

*
    *
  • {@link event} on channel {@link olat resourceable}:
    * TODO:${user}:a describe fired multiuser events.
    • *
*

listening to:

*
    *
  • {@link event} on channel {@link olat resourceable}:
    * reason why listening to this specific multiuser event?
    * action this triggers the recalculation/redisplaying/disposing of .... .
    • *
*

* *

Locks:

*
    *
  • {@link olat resourceable as lock}:
    * reason i.e. to ensure only one users edits resource XX. * acquired TODO:${user}:a Inform about acquired and released locks.
    * released when disposed.
    • *
*

* *

Activateable targets:

*
    *
  • {@link #member link} or message string:
    * activates the component XY. TODO:${user}:a List the view identifiers and their respective actions triggered.
    • *
*

* *

Special translators:

* TODO:${user}:a Is ${enclosing_type} using * different translators then * the ${enclosing_package} translator? *

* *

Hints:

* Tell about pre and postcondition when using this controller, possible * side-effects, locking problems. *

*

Events fired:

*
    *
  • {@link #MEMBER}:
    * TODO:${user}:a add fired events, tell why and when fired.
    • *
  • {@link org.olat.gui.components.XXX XXX component events}}:
    * Forwards all events from the XXX component.
    • *
*

*

template.name: olat_legalnote
template.description: legal note for olat, insert at very top of file

templates.template:
